TalkingSkull.synopsis: A door blocking the entrance to the Bhaal section of the undercity ruins. Being rewritten - It was originally a skull, so it probably doesn't fit a door, but the original idea was to give it a little irreverance for characterisation.
TalkingSkull.how_to_trigger: - Teleport into Undercity Ruins (Debug trigger teleport)- Approach and talk to the skull on the stick

AD_Farslayer.synopsis: Simple unvoiced AD for the Farslayer. He regularly casts Power Word: Kill and is meant to be target number one in the fight (the others leave if he dies). The AD is meant to play on his first turn, and is there purely to draw attention to the players that the idea is to move forward and kill him to get past them.

AD_AmbushGroup1.synopsis: . A cultist ambush group that you can sneak up on and hear saying some relatively simple worldbuilding dialogue. Bhaal cultists discuss their love of murder etc.

AD_CombatOver.synopsis: Bhaal cultists exit line - Can be one of 15 or so cultists, so adding them all into the speaker group but it's intended currently as an unvoiced AD

AD_LookoutSpotsPlayer.synopsis: A simple call from the lookout, to call attention to the fact that the attackers inside will all now start to dogpile on the adventurers.

AD_WhisperingStatue.synopsis: Various Bhaal statues that whisper ominously
AD_WhisperingStatue.how_to_trigger: Approach a statue in the approach to the Bhaal Temple

AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant.synopsis: Bhaal Statues that speak the lines in order. These should be creepy as hell.
AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant.how_to_trigger: Walk past the Bhaal statues - they will recite it in order

AD_AmbushGroup3.synopsis: A cultist ambush group that you can sneak up on and hear saying some relatively simple worldbuilding dialogue. Bhaal cultists discuss their love of murder etc.

AD_AmbushGroup2.synopsis: A cultist ambush group that you can sneak up on and hear saying some relatively simple worldbuilding dialogue. Really useful as a way to communicate some of the harder info we need for Undercity Ruins.

TalkingSkull_29.speaker: Narrator
TalkingSkull_29.text: *A rush of ancient whispers fills your mind as you approach the door. It is rife with magic - old, deathly magic.*
TalkingSkull_29.context: InternalNodeContext: As if the skull is bored - like someone repeating a script for the millionth time.

TalkingSkull_18.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_18.text: A new vessel brimming with blood darkens Bhaal's door - to baptise his dais most holy.

TalkingSkull_21.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_21.text: Do you have proof of your faith to our lord?

TalkingSkull_30.speaker: Player
TalkingSkull_30.text: I have an Amulet of Bhaal - let me pass, door.

TalkingSkull_33.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_33.text: Worthy hands hold proof of faith - as the Dread Lord desires.
TalkingSkull_33.context:
InternalNodeContext: I'm putting the "person approvals" under one bracket for brevity, For clarity all of these pass the same check, where you can have:

- Persuaded/deceived the skull into approving you as a person
- Be the Dark Urge
- Be the Unholy Assassin

TalkingSkull_44.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_44.text: You hold proof of faith - but to hold and deserve are different. How have you proven yourself in the Dread Lord's eyes?
TalkingSkull_44.context: InternalNodeContext: Cowed, realising they probably shouldn't have been irreverent

TalkingSkull_22.speaker: Player
TalkingSkull_22.text: I'm one of Bhaal's Unholy Assassins.

TalkingSkull_42.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_42.text: The truth is heard, and it pleases Him. The door will part.

TalkingSkull_16.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_16.text: You lie. You are not faithful. The door stays closed.

TalkingSkull_28.speaker: Player
TalkingSkull_28.text: Father says it's my turn at the Temple. Let me in!

TalkingSkull_52.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_52.text: Unorthodox - but a show of faith nonetheless.

TalkingSkull_14.speaker: Player
TalkingSkull_14.text: How could I prove my faith?

TalkingSkull_36.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_36.text: Then shut this door shall stay.

TalkingSkull_24.speaker: Player
TalkingSkull_24.text: Bhaal created me above all others. Open for his prodigy!

TalkingSkull_19.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_19.text: Then you must know the way. Present the symbol, proof of your Father's favour.

TalkingSkull_27.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_27.text: Proof of faith, held in worthy hands. It is as the Dread Lord requires.

TalkingSkull_35.speaker: Player
TalkingSkull_35.text: I don't have the symbol on me.

TalkingSkull_7.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_7.text: An Amulet of the Dread Lord's likeness. Simple for his spawn to acquire.

TalkingSkull_8.speaker: Player
TalkingSkull_8.text: I have proven my faith to the Tribunal. I'm an Unholy Assassin of Bhaal.
TalkingSkull_8.context: InternalNodeContext: Skull assesses the viability after this.

TalkingSkull_2.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_2.text: Then show the symbol the Justice granted you.

TalkingSkull_50.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_50.text: Then you will show the symbol granted by the Justice.

TalkingSkull_40.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_40.text: You must bear proof of the Dread Lord's favour - or pay His toll of blood.

TalkingSkull_31.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_31.text: The vessel returns, most shamefully unleaking. Prove your faith.

TalkingSkull_43.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_43.text: The spill of murderous loins approaches once more. Show a proof of faith, spillage.

TalkingSkull_51.speaker: Door
TalkingSkull_51.text: It has shown its worth, the door will part. Walk in blood.

AD_Farslayer_0.speaker: Farslayer of Bhaal Ghislev
AD_Farslayer_0.text: The trial begins. Best me and pass, or die.

AD_AmbushGroup1_1.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Unna
AD_AmbushGroup1_1.text: It is our time - can you feel it?
AD_AmbushGroup1_1.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup1_6.speaker: Night Blade Voraks Oram
AD_AmbushGroup1_6.text: Indeed. The streets will soon sing with blood.
AD_AmbushGroup1_6.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup1_2.speaker: Night Blade Damasno
AD_AmbushGroup1_2.text: The cattle above have no idea what is coming.
AD_AmbushGroup1_2.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup1_4.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Unna
AD_AmbushGroup1_4.text: Orin is nearly beside herself with glee.
AD_AmbushGroup1_4.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup1_0.speaker: Night Blade Voraks Oram
AD_AmbushGroup1_0.text: She is the blood-bringer. She is murder.
AD_AmbushGroup1_0.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup1_7.speaker: Night Blade Damasno
AD_AmbushGroup1_7.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup1_5.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Unna
AD_AmbushGroup1_5.text: Which of our brothers and sisters will survive the onslaught, do you think?
AD_AmbushGroup1_5.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup1_8.speaker: Night Blade Voraks Oram
AD_AmbushGroup1_8.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup1_3.speaker: Night Blade Damasno
AD_AmbushGroup1_3.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_CombatOver_0.text: The trial is complete, the way is open.

AD_LookoutSpotsPlayer_0.speaker: Night Blade Vrylda
AD_LookoutSpotsPlayer_0.text: Hark! The lamb comes to the slaughter!

AD_WhisperingStatue_0.context: NodeContext: creepy, demented, whispered (laugh one should be creepy and kind of maniacal)

AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant_0.text: But Alaundo did not see. He did not know. He did not revel in the glory of what is to come.
AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Filled with maliceNodeContext: mocking, cruel, hint of the chaos that is to come. CREEPY

AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant_1.context: InternalNodeContext: The alaundo prophecy - This is not the lord of murder admitting he will die, but mockingly reciting his original fate.NodeContext: Mocking, cruel CREEPY

AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Mocking once more, Bhaal is better and wiser than Alaundo, and Bhaal knows it.NodeContext: Mocking, cruel, thinks alaundo is full of shit, CREEPY

AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant_3.text: '...but in his doom he shall spawn a score of mortal progeny.'
AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Proud of his own accomplishmentsNodeContext: Mocking, cruel CREEPY

AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant_4.text: 'Chaos will be sewn from their passage.'
AD_WhisperingStatueBhaalChant_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Proud - The father that is glad from the chaos they wroughtNodeContext: delighted, CREEPY

AD_AmbushGroup3_1.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Nua
AD_AmbushGroup3_1.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_8.speaker: Night Blade Vhornall
AD_AmbushGroup3_8.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_0.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Nua
AD_AmbushGroup3_0.text: I thought I felt... hm. It is nothing.
AD_AmbushGroup3_0.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_7.speaker: Night Blade Nikolat
AD_AmbushGroup3_7.text: May I ask, what is Mistress Orin like?
AD_AmbushGroup3_7.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_6.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Nua
AD_AmbushGroup3_6.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_10.speaker: Night Blade Nikolat
AD_AmbushGroup3_10.text: I - I have never formally spoken to her. I wish to please her, as you do.
AD_AmbushGroup3_10.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_3.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Nua
AD_AmbushGroup3_3.text: Orin does not speak formally, she speaks savagely.
AD_AmbushGroup3_3.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_5.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Nua
AD_AmbushGroup3_5.text: Do as Lord Bhaal commands - that is all she cares for.
AD_AmbushGroup3_5.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_9.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Nua
AD_AmbushGroup3_9.text: Tell me, brother. How many did you kill in the end?
AD_AmbushGroup3_9.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_2.speaker: Night Blade Vhornall
AD_AmbushGroup3_2.text: A dozen. It was as though Lord Bhaal himself was by my side.
AD_AmbushGroup3_2.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup3_4.speaker: Death's Head of Bhaal Nua
AD_AmbushGroup3_4.text: He was. He guides your blade. You will make a fine Reaper one day.
AD_AmbushGroup3_4.context: NodeContext: speaing softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_3.speaker: Night Blade Henrdryx
AD_AmbushGroup2_3.text: My blood sings. Someone is close.
AD_AmbushGroup2_3.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_6.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Smelter
AD_AmbushGroup2_6.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_0.speaker: Night Blade Henrdryx
AD_AmbushGroup2_0.text: Stand close, stand ready. Kill beautifully.
AD_AmbushGroup2_0.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_4.speaker: Night Blade Henrdryx
AD_AmbushGroup2_4.text: Tell me what you hear. What you feel.
AD_AmbushGroup2_4.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_2.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Smelter
AD_AmbushGroup2_2.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_5.speaker: Night Blade Henrdryx
AD_AmbushGroup2_5.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_8.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Villiss
AD_AmbushGroup2_8.text: My blood pounds. My heart races. I feel as though I sit on a knife's edge... What is this?
AD_AmbushGroup2_8.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_1.speaker: Night Blade Henrdryx
AD_AmbushGroup2_1.text: It is good. That is the lust for a fight that will push you to your limits. A worthy sacrifice is near.
AD_AmbushGroup2_1.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_7.speaker: Reaper of Bhaal Smelter
AD_AmbushGroup2_7.text: Should we return to the temple?
AD_AmbushGroup2_7.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush

AD_AmbushGroup2_9.speaker: Night Blade Henrdryx
AD_AmbushGroup2_9.text: Our place is here. Our kill is here. Be patient.
AD_AmbushGroup2_9.context: NodeContext: speaking softly, waiting in ambush: mildly irritated, trying to teach a group of cultist assassins to be patient
